-e ---
---
# reanalysis

[Alignment](Alignment.html) within the same language is called internal reanalysis.  
[Alignment](Alignment.html) within the same language family is called mediated reanalysis.  
[Alignment](Alignment.html) within unrelated languages is called external reanalysis.  

Reanalysis often arises through semantic [permutation](permutation.html)s.  

See [phono-semantic-matching](phono-semantic-matching.html) of [wanderword](wanderword.html)s
